content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator x squared, plus 4, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the natural log of, open parenthesis, x squared, plus 4, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the arc tangent of, open parenthesis, the fraction x over 4, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>arctan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one fourth times, the arc tangent of, open parenthesis, the fraction x over 2, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mstyle><mrow><mi>arctan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half times, the arc tangent of, open parenthesis, the fraction x over 2, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mstyle><mrow><mi>arctan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half times, the arc tangent of, open parenthesis, the fraction x over 2, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mstyle><mrow><mi>arctan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
